Headline: #50 Damen Temporary Reroute near Damen and Lake
ShortDescription: 50 Damen buses temp. rerouted Southbound: Grand, Western, Warren and Damen; Northbound: Washington, Western, Grand and Damen due to street blockage.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#50 Damen buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Damen and Lake due to street blockage.

Southbound buses will operate via Grand, Western, Warren and Damen.

Northbound buses will operate via Washington, Western, Grand and Damen.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #39 Pershing Temporary Reroute near Pershing/Wells
ShortDescription: 39 Pershing buses temp. rerouted EB: 39th, Wallace, Root, Princeton and 39th; Wb: 39th, Princeton, Root, Wallace and 39th due to street blockage.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#39 Pershing buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near 39th and Wells due to street blockage.

Eastbound buses will operate via 39th, Wallace, Root and Princeton and 39th.

Westbound buses will operate via 39th, Princeton, Root, Wallace and 39th.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Howard-bound Red Line Service Delayed at 69th
ShortDescription: Howard-bound Red Line trains are standing at 69th due to a door problem on a train. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Howard-bound Red Line trains are standing at 69th due to a door problem on a train.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
